title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.24 - Town of Ulster
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.24 - Town of Ulster

State Regulations
(a) -(b)
[Repealed]
(c) Boices Lane. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Boices Lane between Neighborhood Road and

Morton Boulevard in the Town of Ulster. (d) Morton Boulevard. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Morton Boulevard between Boices Lane and the United

Parcel Service terminal in the Town of Ulster. (e) Neighborhood Road. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Neighborhood Road between Route 209 and Boices Lane in
the Town of Ulster. (f) [Repealed]
(g) Route 199. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 199, including the

Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge, between Route 9W and the Dutchess county line, a
distance of 2.4+- miles; provided, however, that the Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge
shall not be used between the hours of 6:30 a.m. and 8:30 a.m., and from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8151.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
